word: This interview brought so vividly to my mind the past--the rejection of that which I knew to be the message and works of God, and how offensive was the position of some of our leading brethren in the sight of God--that I shall not be one who will come down with severity on those who are honestly trying to have faith and do something, although they may make mistakes and some ardent ones may receive ideas and impressions and carry things in their excitable spirit to extremes. Here I let the matter rest.
